reviewText: spectacular movie down to earth and moving

This movie was on TV a year ago, and I caught the last half hour of it. Searched to see when it would be on again. Of course, good movies seem to only be on once. Began a search for it online and was happy to find it. Now I understand how the story came about.

This movie might be all right if you're 12 years old, otherwise, skip this one.

The one positive, is that it is a clean, family film, that is why it got 2 stars instead of 1.
